charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
through town, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Piers staring into space on
the side of the street.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_0400_1:
Are you wonderin’ what we were doin’? We were
just cooling ourselves down from the live show
we had.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_0900_1:
We had different reactions from the audience,
because of Toxtricity’s low-key personality and
my musicality.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_1000_1:
Toxtricity’s been a member of my band since
we’ve been in Galar, and...
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_1100_1:
he matches my melancholy musicality, so he’s the
best partner I could have.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_1200_1:
We’ve many young fans that admire Toxtricity’s
dullness, but some of our audience get angry at
his attitude.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_1300_1:
Some people will like it, while others won’t—just
like my songs.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_1400_1:
Well, part of the fun during a live show is seeing
the different reactions from the audience.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_1500_1:
For example, Roxie will try to get the audience’s
attention usin’ the opposite method to mine.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_0401_1700_1:
She’d pump up the crowd and get their energy
goin’, I suppose...
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_0402_1900_1:
Yeah, there are many forms of music as there
are artists.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_2100_1:
When Roxie and I decided to have a jam session, I
gave her a Toxel.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_2200_1:
Then, her Toxel evolved into an Amped
Form Toxtricity.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_2300_1:
Roxie’s Toxtricity seems to prefer lively and intense
music, which is perfect for her partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_2400_1:
And that’s the opposite to me. Apparently, a
Pokémon’s musicality is similar to the Trainer’s...
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_2700_1: Or should I say, which kinda music do you like?
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_0401_2900_1: Oh, so you’ve some fiery spirits, huh?
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_0401_3000_1: I guess that affects the way you battle, too.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_0402_3300_1:
If I were to be honest, I kinda knew you were
gonna say that. I felt our souls were resonatin’.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_3400_1: Everyone has different tastes in music...
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_3500_1:
But I want to keep making music that people can
take in with ease when they want something to
listen to.
charaepi_ch0256_10_nezz/2301_1201_3600_1:
Just like a Low Key Form Toxtricity—music that
doesn’t make you feel pressured, flows naturally,
and sets a laid-back mood.
